data.title: There is always a guarantee you will  like it
data.text: From taco salad to  burritos and breakfast menu  deals, the  meals are filling  and  tasty. Friendly staff make it the  way you ask them to.

data.title: Happened to be in this area and stopped for a bite to eat.
data.text: Stopped by for fast food. I got a two bean burritos with cheese and onions. I would have liked more beans. It seemed like mostly tortilla and you must ask for cheese and onions in order to taste them. Good though for fast food!

data.title: Took kids last night.........
data.text: Our grandaughter's pal is gluten intolerant and Taco Bell is one of the places she can eat. Into the drive thru, ordered 3 rice bowls and 3 tacos. They were good except the 1 bean bowl had next to no beans!! The child ate them anyway and liked them. Service was quick and accurate.
